title: Top 10 Best No-Log VPNs for Ultimate Privacy and Security
description: Discover the top 10 VPN services with strict no-log policies to safeguard your online privacy and security. Compare features, encryption protocols, and server networks to find the perfect VPN for your needs.

body.raw:
When it comes to protecting your online privacy, choosing a VPN with a strict no-log policy is crucial. Here are our top picks for the best no-log VPN services available:

1. **Mullvad VPN**:
   Mullvad VPN tops our list for its unwavering commitment to user privacy. With Mullvad, your online activities remain completely anonymous thanks to its strict no-logs policy and anonymous account creation process. Mullvad also employs strong encryption protocols, including WireGuard and OpenVPN, to ensure your data stays secure. Plus, with its unique feature of accepting anonymous payments via cash, Bitcoin, or cryptocurrency, Mullvad truly goes the extra mile to protect your privacy.
   ![Mullvad VPN](https://www.techopedia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Mullvad-VPN-Logo.jpeg)

2. **ExpressVPN**:
   ExpressVPN is renowned for its blazing-fast speeds, robust security features, and user-friendly interface. With servers in over 160 locations across 94 countries, ExpressVPN provides reliable access to geo-restricted content and seamless streaming and torrenting experiences. Its military-grade encryption and TrustedServer technology ensure maximum privacy and security, while its no-logs policy guarantees that your online activities remain anonymous. Plus, ExpressVPN offers 24/7 customer support and a 30-day money-back guarantee, making it a top choice for users seeking both performance and peace of mind.
   ![Express VPN](https://images.ctfassets.net/u6u9ehxmteql/5pBCYP4qRthnmm3ett1uRE/5f03720ce9981f96cfddf01f940d99ea/ExpressVPN_Vertical_Logo_White_on_Red-preview.png)

3. **NordVPN**:
   NordVPN is a trusted name in the VPN industry, known for its extensive server network, strong security features, and commitment to user privacy. With over 5,400 servers in 60 countries, NordVPN offers unparalleled access to geo-restricted content and high-speed streaming and torrenting capabilities. Its Double VPN and Onion Over VPN features provide extra layers of encryption for enhanced security and anonymity, while its CyberSec technology blocks malware and intrusive ads. NordVPN operates under a strict no-logs policy audited by PricewaterhouseCoopers, ensuring that your online activities remain private. Additionally, NordVPN offers 24/7 customer support and a 30-day money-back guarantee for added peace of mind.
   ![Nord VPN](https://i.pcmag.com/imagery/reviews/07lyyVIatWNmQKm97hGohzg-9..v1569477664.png)

4. **CyberGhost VPN**:
   CyberGhost VPN is a user-friendly VPN service known for its extensive server network and robust security features. With over 7,000 servers in 91 countries, CyberGhost VPN offers reliable access to geo-restricted content for streaming, torrenting, and browsing. Its strong encryption and strict no-logs policy ensure that your online activities remain private and secure. CyberGhost VPN also includes specialized servers for streaming and torrenting, as well as an ad blocker and malware blocker to enhance your online experience further. With apps available for all major platforms and support for up to 7 simultaneous connections, CyberGhost VPN is a versatile and reliable choice for users seeking both privacy and convenience.
   ![CyberGhost VPN](https://i.pcmag.com/imagery/reviews/01TmxQLjTF4WLPW7b3zwqTv-15..v1569473409.png)

5. **Surfshark**:
   Surfshark is a feature-packed VPN service that prioritizes affordability and user privacy. With a global network of over 3,200 servers in 65 countries, Surfshark offers fast and reliable connections for streaming, torrenting, and browsing. Its CleanWeb feature blocks ads, trackers, and malware, enhancing your online security and browsing experience. Surfshark's MultiHop feature allows you to connect via multiple countries simultaneously for added anonymity, while its NoBorders mode bypasses censorship and geo-blocking restrictions. With a strict no-logs policy, industry-standard encryption, and unlimited simultaneous connections, Surfshark provides comprehensive protection for all your devices at an unbeatable price.
   ![Surfshark VPN](https://i.pcmag.com/imagery/reviews/04QygPlFMBIJRVMggN25qC7-1..v1654869345.png)

6. **ProtonVPN**:
   ProtonVPN is a highly respected VPN provider known for its focus on security and privacy. Developed by the team behind ProtonMail, ProtonVPN offers a strict no-logs policy and is headquartered in Switzerland, known for its strong privacy laws. With servers in over 50 countries, ProtonVPN provides fast and reliable connections for streaming, torrenting, and browsing. Its Secure Core architecture routes traffic through multiple servers to ensure maximum privacy and protection against network attacks. Plus, ProtonVPN offers built-in DNS leak protection, strong encryption, and a kill switch feature to safeguard your online activities. Whether you're using ProtonVPN's free tier or its premium plans, you can trust that your privacy is in good hands.
   ![ProtonVPN](https://static1.howtogeekimages.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/ProtonVPN-logo-on-a-white-background.jpg)

7. **Private Internet Access (PIA)**:
   Private Internet Access (PIA) is a trusted VPN service known for its strong commitment to user privacy and security. With a vast network of over 35,000 servers in 78 countries, PIA offers high-speed connections and reliable access to geo-restricted content. PIA's no-logs policy ensures that your online activities remain private, while its advanced features such as split tunneling and customizable encryption settings give you full control over your VPN experience. Additionally, PIA offers built-in ad and malware blocking, as well as support for up to 10 simultaneous connections, making it an excellent choice for both individuals and families looking to protect their online privacy.
   ![PIA VPN](https://i.pcmag.com/imagery/reviews/01gzf2i73u7uAk08rsioA8v-22.fit_scale.size_760x427.v1625756770.jpg)

8. **VyprVPN**:
   VyprVPN is a trusted VPN provider renowned for its proprietary Chameleon protocol, designed to bypass censorship and VPN blocking. With over 700 servers in 70+ locations worldwide, VyprVPN offers fast and reliable connections for streaming, gaming, and browsing. Its strong encryption and strict no-logs policy ensure that your online activities remain private and secure. VyprVPN also offers unique features such as its own DNS service, VyprDNS, which enhances privacy and prevents DNS leaks. With apps available for all major platforms and support for up to 5 simultaneous connections, VyprVPN is a solid choice for users seeking both security and versatility.
   ![VyprVPN](https://i.pcmag.com/imagery/reviews/04P4cX4wQjknCZrzfScWAy3-6.fit_scale.size_760x427.v1569478101.png)

9. **Windscribe**:
   Windscribe is a comprehensive VPN service known for its generous free tier and robust security features. With servers in over 110 cities across 63 countries, Windscribe offers fast and reliable connections for streaming, torrenting, and browsing. Its strong encryption and strict no-logs policy ensure that your online activities remain private and secure. Windscribe also includes features like ad blocking, tracker blocking, and firewall protection to enhance your online privacy and security further. Plus, with support for unlimited simultaneous connections and compatibility with all major platforms, Windscribe is an excellent choice for users looking for a versatile and budget-friendly VPN solution.
   ![Windscribe](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/61MBBK+vS1L.png)

10. **Ivacy VPN**:
    Ivacy VPN offers a comprehensive set of features designed to provide users with privacy, security, and seamless browsing experiences. With a network of over 3500 servers across 100+ locations worldwide, Ivacy VPN ensures fast and reliable connections for streaming, torrenting, and browsing. Its strong encryption protocols and strict no-logs policy guarantee that your online activities remain private and secure. Ivacy VPN also includes features such as split tunneling, dedicated IP addresses, and built-in malware protection to enhance your online privacy and security further.
    ![Ivacy VPN](https://www.techopedia.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Ivacy-VPN-Logo.jpeg)
